Summary: Bright lime green ball of fire.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching tv and out of the corner of my eye I saw a green light. I looked out the window and saw what looked like a bright lime green ball of fire. It appeared to be just hanging there and then it disappeared from my sight. I ran to the next room to see where it went but it was gone.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Mt Pleasant
There were no other sightings in Mt Pleasant on or around January 20th 2009
